attributes.action: Stop the rollout of Vaccine Passport
attributes.additional_details:
The Vaccine Passport is ridiculous and should not be bought in , You have to respect peoples beliefs & Religions.

You are going to loose any trust in the public should it go ahead.
attributes.background:
This Goverment are step by step removing our human rights, A Vaccine passport is a way of blackmail.
It is against human rights and peoples religions and beliefs.
They are trying to force people into taking this vaccine that does not actually give you immunity to Covid.
